sentences.english: Let us share morning dew and cold wave together , share rosy clouds and fog mists .
sentences.chinese: 讓我們一起分擔朝露和寒潮，共享雲霞和霧靄。

sentences.english: Neon lights gleamed in the deepening mists.
sentences.chinese: 霓虹燈在漸濃的霧靄中隱約閃爍。

sentences.english: Season of mists and mellow fruitfulness.
sentences.chinese: 霧靄的季節，果實圓熟的時令。

sentences.english: Time has traveled into fragmentary memories of the dawn and then melt into one wipe mist.
sentences.chinese: 光陰把回想輾轉成零碎，化做晨曦中的一抹霧靄。

sentences.english: Strolling along the boulevard, one feels as if the West Lake were wakening in dawn mist.
sentences.chinese: 信步長堤，仿若西湖從霧靄中剛睡醒似的。

sentences.english: Pale stone arches marched off into the fog, reaching from the Palace of Sorrow to the river's western bank.
sentences.chinese: 蒼白的石拱跨過霧靄，搭在河流西岸的傷心地之宮。

sentences.english: At evening the lake hazed over.
I loved the way the lights shone through the fog and silhouetted the people as they walked.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡這種光線穿過霧靄勾勒出行人輪廓的畫面。

sentences.english: Sulphur dioxide can shroud the planet in a cooling haze.
sentences.chinese: 二氧化硫可以把地球包裹在一層冷卻的霧靄中。

sentences.english: Sort of a purple haze over the Corn Belt. Makes us sneeze, as well.
sentences.chinese: 紫色的霧靄籠罩在谷堆上方，偶爾會使我們打個噴嚏。

sentences.english: The fog, plays upon the heart of the hills and brings out surprises of beauty.
sentences.chinese: 這霧靄，挑逗着羣山的心，呈現出令人震驚的幻美。

sentences.english: The mist was turning from black to grey and from grey to white.
sentences.chinese: 霧靄由墨黑變爲淺灰，再有淺灰轉爲雪白。

sentences.english: May mists, for the casements, fetch.
Its path athwart the thunder-smoke of dawn.
sentences.chinese: 斜穿雷電霧靄，直奔黎明。

sentences.english: Riparian the weeping willow in the evening as the Waterfall Mist Lane, as a capital injection of the rainstorm.
sentences.chinese: 河岸的垂柳在黃昏的霧靄裏像瀑布，又像如注的暴雨。

definition: nuée ardente/hot cloud of volcanic ash
to flicker/to flash on and off/to brighten and fade
to cut off/to interrupt/to prevent access
to lie in disarray/to cut across/to traverse
